dct:title.value: Best Practices in Decentralised Renewable Energy Access: A Knowledge Transfer Initiative from India to Africa and other ASEAN Regions

foaf:Person.foaf:name: The International Renewable Energy Agency IRENA

foaf:Organization.foaf:name: Knowledge Partnership Programme- IPE Global Pvt Ltd

bibo:abstract.value: This summary report informs on the journey of knowledge transfer on decentralised energy access from India to Africa and other Asian countries, the outcomes and the next steps.
